DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates change over time in neurocognitive testing in subjects receiving statin therapy in combination with evolocumab (AMG 145), compared with subjects receiving statin therapy in combination with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating PCSK9 Binding antiBody Influence oN coGnitive HeAlth in High cardiovascUlar Risk Subjects
DOC.criteria: Randomized into Study 20110118 (FOURIER) Current or known past diagnosis of dementia or mild cognitive impairment (MCI)
